member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Sustainability#Calculation#Sustainability Calc# Mgt#.GetCollectableGLAmount(Sustain# Account Category,Date,Date):Decimal
member.summary: Filter general ledger entries by criteria defined in sustainability category and by date and calculate the total
member.param: Specifies the sustainability category that contains default filters.
Specifies the "from" part of a date filter .
Specifies the "to" part of a date filter .
member.returns: The sum of G/L Entry Amounts.

member.name: M:Page::Microsoft#Sustainability#Journal#Sustainability Journal.SetRecurringView
member.summary: Set the page to be opened in recurring view.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Sustainability#Journal#Sustainability Journal Mgt#.GetASustainabilityJournalBatch(Boolean):Sustainability Jnl# Batch
member.summary: Get a Sustainability Journal Batch. If more than one Template exists, the user will be prompted to select one. If no Template/Batch exists, a default one will be created.
member.param: Specifies whether the template is recurring.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Sustainability#Journal#Sustainability Journal Mgt#.SelectTemplate(Boolean):Sustainability Jnl# Template
member.summary: Select a Sustainability Journal Template. If more than one Template exists, the user will be prompted to select one. If no Template exists, a default one will be created.
member.param: Specifies whether the template is recurring.

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Sustainability#Journal#Sustainability Journal Mgt#.OpenJournalPageFromBatch(Sustainability Jnl# Batch,Sustainability Jnl# Template)
member.summary: Open the Sustainability Journal for the active Sustainability Batch. Specifies the Sustainability Journal Batch. Specifies the "Sustainability Jnl. Template"

member.name: M:Codeunit::Microsoft#Sustainability#Journal#Sustainability Journal Mgt#.CheckScopeMatchWithBatch(Sustainability Jnl# Line)
member.summary: Emission Scope from Account Category must match the Emission Scope on the Journal Batch. Unless the Emission Scope on the Journal Batch is not set.
